Plot: It's the fall of 1985. The intertwining tales of three 5th grade friends, Chris, Joe and Ted, unfold in the suburban paradise of Palo Alto, as the threat of a mountain lion looms over the community.
Title: Yosemite
Writer: Gabrielle Demeestere, James Franco (based on: the short stories "Yosemite" and "Peter Parker" by)
Actors: James Franco, Henry Hopper, Barry Del Sherman, George Maguire
